instructors.name: John Smith
instructors.background: John Smith is a professional photographer and filmmaker with over 10 years of experience. He has worked on numerous projects, including documentaries, short films, and commercial advertisements. His expertise lies in capturing breathtaking landscapes and telling compelling visual stories.

keyLearnings.brief: Learn the basics of photography and master the art of capturing stunning images.

instructors.name: Emily Johnson
instructors.background: Emily Johnson is an experienced filmmaker and cinematographer. She has a passion for storytelling through visual mediums and enjoys teaching aspiring filmmakers.

instructors.name: Michael Davis
instructors.background: Michael Davis is a renowned filmmaker with extensive experience in directing and editing. He has worked on several award-winning films and enjoys sharing his knowledge with enthusiastic students.

keyLearnings.brief: Discover the art of film making and learn essential techniques to bring your creative vision to life.

instructors.name: Sarah Thompson
instructors.background: Sarah Thompson is an accomplished professional photographer specializing in portrait and fashion photography. She has an eye for detail and enjoys sharing her knowledge with aspiring photographers.

keyLearnings.brief: Take your photography skills to the next level and learn advanced techniques to capture stunning images.
keyFeatures: Advanced camera settings and exposure control

instructors.name: Alex Ramirez
instructors.background: Alex Ramirez is a skilled video editor with experience in various genres, including commercials, music videos, and short films. He enjoys teaching students the art of storytelling through editing.

keyLearnings.brief: Unlock the power of video editing software and learn to create captivating visual narratives.

instructors.name: Michael Davis
instructors.background: Michael Davis is a renowned filmmaker with extensive experience in directing and editing. He has worked on several award-winning films and enjoys sharing his knowledge with enthusiastic students.

keyLearnings.brief: Learn the essentials of cinematography and elevate the visual quality of your films.
keyFeatures: Lighting for different moods and settings
Working with different lenses and filters

instructors.name: Jessica Anderson

keyLearnings.brief: Learn the art of screenwriting and develop compelling narratives for film and television.
